string.value: You lost the Dragon Saddle! What to do? Go to #b#p2060005##k in the #b#m230000000# #m230000003##k and ask for another saddle.

#p2060005# says that he will make you a saddle if you bring her #b50 #t4000155#s#k and #b1 #t4032474##k like before. However, unlike last time, he won't give you a special discount and will charge the full #b20 million mesos#k. Bring him all the materials.

#i4000155# #t4000155# #b#c4000155# / 50#k
#i4032474# #t4032474# #b#c4032474# / 1#k
#b20000000 mesos#k
You received the saddle from #p2060005# again. It's not cheap so you should be careful not to lose it again.
Oh, you're the person who wanted to mount that strange animal. What brings you back? Did you lose the saddle?

In that case, you'll have to gather all of the materials for the saddle again. Let me remind you what they are. You need #b50 #t4000155#s#k, #b1 #t4032474##k, and most importantly, the fee... Hehehe...
I gave you a special discount last time, but this time I'll have to charge you #b20 million mesos#k. Since your level is so high, this should be easy for you, right? Have a nice day!
If you don't want to bring me the materials, I can't make you a saddle.
You've brought all the materials! And the fee as well! Hehe, I'll go ahead and start making your saddle. I should be able to make it much faster this time.
Here is the completed saddle. Enjoy it and feel free to come back if you happen to lose it. See you next time!
You haven't gathered all of the materials for the saddle yet. I'll make you the saddle if you bring me #b50 #t4000155#s#k, #b1 #t4032474##k, and a #bfee of 20 million mesos#k.
